snippet: The men, former associates of Viktor Bout, were denied a certificate that would allow them to transport weapons, the government and a private group say.
abstract: Government of Mauritius blocks two former business associates of Viktor Bout, the convicted Russian arms dealer now in federal prison in the United States, from setting up an aviation company that could have been used for smuggling guns.

byline.contributor: C. J. Chivers contributed reporting from Antakya, Turkey.

lead_paragraph: The men, former associates of Viktor Bout, were denied a certificate that would allow them to transport weapons, the government and a private group say.

headline.seo: Mauritius Rejects Application From Arms Dealer’s Associates
headline.main: Mauritius Bars Ex-Associates of Arms Dealer
headline.print_headline: Mauritius Bars Ex-Associates Of Arms Dealer
